text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing great! how about yourself?
I'm doing really well.  I was wondering how familiar you are with the effect all the intensifying violence in the world is having on children?
I'm very familiar with the effect that violence is having on children. Having a younger brother myself I get to see it first hand.
Wow. How old is he? What part of the world are you from? In a lot of places because of war and poverty there are just no resources for these kids in danger.
my brother is 9 years old and we live in the southern part of The United States of America.
Have you heard of the organization "Save the Children?"
No I have not. What can you tell me about it?

They are a group dedicated to helping children in danger and need around the world.  They help everywhere from the Rohingya refugees to children devastated by Huricane Harvey down in your region of the US
Ah yes I believe I have heard of that organization before. I really appreciate what all of those people do to help others in trouble, its a very noble cause.
Yes. And they try to cover all their bases with programs not just for relief, but also education, protection, and health promotion.
That's amazing! I didn't know they branched out into other things like education!
Yes. Everything from research to direct support of schools and children at all levels.  Would you be interested in hearing how you personally could help Save the Children and make a big difference!
yes, I would love to know how I can help!
Well, as with anything all of these programs cost money to run. So the organization is always looking for donations.  The great thing is that even very small amounts can do amazing things!
Thats great! How can I make a donation?
Well, fortunately the research team we are working with has made it very easy to make a donation if you are interested.  All you have to do is agree to it.  Would you like the details?
yes I would like the details

Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to $2.  The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.  How much do you like to donate to the charity now?
i would like to donate $2
That is awesome. Thank you so much.  The children that will be helped appreciate it.  I hope you have a great night.
its a pleasure to help!
